body.name: Amazon Essentials Women's Heavyweight Long-Sleeve Hooded Puffer Coat (Available in Plus Size)
features: REGULAR FIT: Close but comfortable fit through chest, waist, and hips.
WATER-RESISTANT POLYESTER TAFFETA: 100% Polyester plain weave shell fabric. Fully lined, quilted and insulated. Designed to keep you extra protected for the coldest winter days.

THE CLASSIC HOODED PUFFER: Bringing endless comfort and warmth, this is the perfect jacket for all your winter adventures. Layer with a sweater or fleece sweatshirt for the colder winter months. Accessorize your look with Amazon Essential's Scarves and Beanies.

DETAILS: Features a classic quilted pattern, flattering seam details for the perfect fit, front zipper and snap closure, zipper welt-front pockets, storm cuffs, and fleece lined hood and body for extra layer of warmth.
body.description: Amazon Essentials is focused on creating affordable, high-quality, and long-lasting everyday clothing you can rely on. Our line of women's apparel includes cashmere sweaters, fleece and down jackets, and more, including plus-size options. Our consistent sizing takes the guesswork out of shopping, and each piece is put to the test to maintain the highest standards in quality and comfort.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #759 in Our Brands (See Top 100 in Our Brands) #3 in Women's Down Jackets & Parkas

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Worth every penny. HIGHLY RECOMMEND! Zipper on my Colombia jacket of 10 yrs. Finally died. This was way cheaper. It performs the same! Super warm & soft! Fleece lining is a huge plus. Hood is not removable which is fine. Had a storm in Maine and cleaned and shoveled for 45 minutes in 17-23 degrees with flurries and I was not even a bit chilly. The coat isn’t light and has some weight to it. If you’re in Alaska I don’t know if this works. It certainly does in Maine. Going to buy more colors and constantly look for price drops. I found the short version by Amazon for 15.00!!! Overstock price and I don’t care if it’s orange terracotta. Can walk outside with it for passing car visibility.I’m a regular 3X but ordered up to a 4X to fit over winter clothing. I wore a thick hoodie this am and the jacket fit perfectly. Loose not tight at all.Pockets are phenomenal. There is a pocket inside on the left w. Velcro closure. My iPhone fits whole. The outside pockets have a zipper closure which rocks. Pocket size is just right not shallow at all.The arms are a bit longer on me but I don’t care. I am 5’3. They have hand warming sleeves! You can just not wear them if not desired.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars excellent coat for the price - warm and light
reviews.reviewText: This Amazon Essentials Women's Heavyweight Long-Sleeve Hooded Puffer Coat fits, looks, and behaves exactly as expected. I appreciate the hood on windy days and though the sleeve insert/extensions seem cheap and frilly, they actually work well to prevent cold air from coming up into your sleeves (much appreciated while shoveling snow). The zipper and snaps have held up well through wear and several washings. I've bought one in several colors and recommend them highly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars True to Size!
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice, warm winter jacket! Just what I needed. I’d say it fits true to size. It does feel boxy and puffy, especially when zipped up. The arms are a nice length and I especially like that there’s a built-in liner that sort of wraps around your wrists that both extends the arms and adds warmth. Feels well-made and sturdy. Overall a great purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for, warmth and value
reviews.reviewText: This jacket is impressive. It’s very affordable and offers the same level of warmth, comfort and feature as jackets well above this price point. It fits true to size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Warm, comfortable, cute
reviews.reviewText: As a tall, plus size woman with wide shoulders, finding a coat that fits well is tough. This one fits the bill. Plenty of room in the shoulders and chest, good length to the arms. It’s not as long on me as it might be on an average height person, but it almost covers my bum. Not if I sat, though. It arrived as we were experiencing a big freeze, so I got to try it out straight away - it was nice and warm, and there was plenty of room for a sweatshirt and a puffy vest underneath.The only thing I would like better is if the hood could be adjusted.All in all, very happy with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: First of all, I apologize for the dirty mirror — this photo was not intended for reviews but that's all I have at the moment.I have to start saying I absolutely love it. As someone who doesn't deal with cold temps very well, this was a life saver (I live in OH). This puffer is thick, as heavyweight coats are supposed to be. The fleece inside is very comfortable and warm, keeping your upper body fully protected. It's important to say that there's no fleece inside the sleeves, which is understandable but apparently some people didn't know that. The hands details are a nice plus, which you can choose to wear or just tuck inside the sleeves around your wrists likenI do. I chose a large - 5'4" 152lbs - in case I need to layer clothes.I really love how comfortable and warm this coat is and how it looks. I think it was a great purchase and worth every penny.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This coat is very warm and holds up great!
reviews.reviewText: I used this coat daily during last winter and have been using it daily this winter as well. It is warm with deep pockets and the thumb holes that keep your sleeves in place while cleaning snow off your car or shoveling the drive. The hood covers well and it has snaps to keep you zipper covered. I can't think of anything this coat lacks. It looks great and the color is beautiful. For about $40 this coat can't be beat. By the way, I live in Maine and deal with a lot of snow and cold.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Fit like a box and the material is weird
reviews.reviewText: This jackets material is weak and if caught on something sharp or even a twig would rip it. I know the metallic color can be done without those things being its downfall. The look of the material is like it's old and a little dingey. Did I spell that correctly? Anyhow I didn't like the appearance. Then there's the fit. I'll admit my size nothing looks good on me in my perspective. Amazon said based on millions of reviews I should order a xxl. I ordered a XL. I'm 5 foot 4 and 195 and a large would have fit. I even ordered both sized XL in this and XXL in black. I didn't even bother trying on the other one. So I didn't like this metallic color. I've seen this metallic color puffer jacket at Walmart and they are pretty and that's what I expected this to look like but it was ugly. It fit like a big boxy tent. I did like the thing that is in the sleeves that your hands go into but when I didn't want to use them they were kind of loosely hanging over my hands getting in the way even after I thoroughly pushed them way back in the sleevesThe zippers seemed cheap and the stitching was iffy. . The hood was fine but this jacket might look cute if I wasn't so big in my upper body as I'm not used to this. I think a fitted jacket will please me more. I just want to say the material was not up to my expectations and the sizing is too large. I think a large might fit better not a xxl even though I wear XXL tops. I hope my review was thorough enough to help you make the right decision for the size and a warning about this metallic material.

reviews.reviewerName: Muy buena calidad, confortable vale la pena.
reviews.reviewText: Muy linda y de buena calidad

reviews.reviewTitle: Accurate sizing, light but very warm, soft, like getting a hug
reviews.reviewText: Last month, my winter coat was stolen (as well as several other things), and that same evening it started to snow and got really cold. Police and local agencies did nothing and offered no help, even when the temperature went to -40 and lower. Local stores here sell out of any plus size winter coats before winter really starts (and don't get re-stocked), so I decided to take a chance on a coat from Amazon. I'm so glad I took a chance!My experience over many years is that winter coats are sized at least three sizes too small, and the arms are usually even smaller, so imagine my shock to find this 6x (biggest available) is huge on me! It's really a 6x. Not a 3x or 2x labelled 6x.I've already recommended this coat to a relative, who's a large but ordered xl because she wants to be able to wear bulkier clothing under her coat even though I've told her she won't need extra layers. This coat is really warm, even in -45 weather, biting wind blowing while I'm wearing a t-shirt underneath.I like the big hood, the relaxed fit sleeves (the sleeves pull down and cover part of your hands), the pockets are So soft inside and zip shut, the zippers work well, this coat washed well at a laundrymat (I'm staying at a hotel at the moment) in a front loader, and dried on low heat in about 20 minutes. It still had a few damp patches around stitching, but I hung it up to dry overnight and it was totally dry the next morning.This coat is so warm, I actually start to sweat a bit at times, and I'm not doing anything particularly strenuous (not shovelling snow or running).This coat makes me feel like I'm wrapped in a hug, and the first time I put it on and zipped it up, I burst into tears. It feels that light and soft and good. It's much better than the coat that was stolen, and I'm so grateful Amazon delivered my new coat right to my hotel room. (I'd been stuck inside for over two weeks at that point because it was way too cold to go out). I'd never thought about getting a winter coat from Amazon, but I'm so glad I did, and I've been telling everyone about my lovely new puffy coat from Amazon :)

Colore come in foto, caldissimo e comodo, entro benissimo anche con un poncho molto gonfio da sotto, e sono molto curvy. Cerniera e bottoni, tasche richiudibili, e coprimano incorporati. Eccellente a un prezzo conveniente.
Très bonne qualité et efficace contre le froid pour un bon prix

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Comfortable coat, good for the winter
reviews.reviewText: I haven't been in the rain wearing this coat yet so can't comment on thatI sized up to XL as I like items bigger / oversized so this worked well for meThe pockets are a little small but have a zip so you have space for at least your phone and keysOverall very happy with the coat
